string-array.name: rest_messages
string-array.item: Relax your mind, think about the things that makes you happy
Look around you, there\'s a bigger world outside of your screen
Stretch your arms and legs, exercises keeps us healthy
Close your eyes and take a few deep breaths
Stretch your arms and legs, exercises keeps us healthy
Stand up for a while or grab a drink of water
Look at least 20 feet away to prevent eye strain
Slowly rolling your eyes is a simple yet effective eye exercise
Smile, you look good on it
